alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 11 at 6:30PM CDT until August 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE WILL ALLOW SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 626 TO EXPIRE AT 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS ALLOWS TO EXPIRE 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA DALE HENRY HOUSTON IN GEORGIA THIS ALLOWS TO EXPIRE 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BERRIEN COLQUITT COOK IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER EARLY MILLER MITCHELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ADEL, ASBURY, BABCOCK, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BEAMON, BELLVIEW, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLACKWELL FIELD A/P, BLACKWOOD, BLAKELY, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROWNS CROSSROADS, CAMILLA, CENTERVILLE, COLQUITT, COOK CO A/P, COOKTOWN, COTTLE, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, CUBA, DALEVILLE, DILL, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, EARLY CO A/P, ELMODEL WMA, ENTERPRISE, EWELL, FORT RUCKER, GREGGS, HAWKINSTOWN, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HOGGARD MILL, IVEYS MILL, LACONTE, LAWRENCEVILLE, MABSON, MASSEE, MAYHAW, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NASHVILLE, NEWTON, OZARK, PELHAM, PINE VALLEY, RED STORE CROSSROADS, SCREAMER, SPENCE AIRPORT, AND WEBER.
